text: Espresso Displays, the Australian brand known for crafting high-performance portable monitors, has unveiled its latest innovation at CES 2025: the Espresso 15 Pro. This new addition to Espresso Displays’ portfolio is aimed at business professionals and frequent travelers who seek a high-quality, portable dual-screen experience. Having used and reviewed multiple products from Espresso Displays over the years, including the premium 17 Pro and the budget-friendly 15-inch display, I can attest to the brand’s consistent focus on quality, innovation, and user-centric design. Their monitors have always been excellent tools for productivity on the go, and the new Espresso 15 Pro seems to build on that reputation with some exciting upgrades. Key features of the Espresso 15 Pro The Espresso 15 Pro offers a brighter, more compact, and more efficient portable display solution, with specs that cater to both business users and creatives alike: Brightness: 550 nits for excellent visibility even in bright environments Resolution: 4K UHD (3840 x 2160) for crystal-clear visuals Color Range: More than one billion colors with 100% AdobeRGB coverage Touchscreen Compatibility: Works with macOS, Windows, iPhones, iPads, and Samsung Galaxy devices via DeX Pen Support: Compatible with the espresso Pen for note-taking, sketching, and markups Portability: Single USB-C cable connection and lightweight aluminum build for easy transport The device connects seamlessly to laptops, tablets, and even smartphones, making it an ideal companion for those who need flexibility in their work setups. The magnetic Stand+ accessory further enhances usability by providing ergonomic viewing angles and quick setup. Design & build quality Espresso Displays are known for their minimalist and premium designs, and the Espresso 15 Pro is no exception. With a sleek matte-black aluminum chassis, the monitor exudes professionalism while ensuring durability. The magnetic attachment to the Stand+ makes it easy to set up and adjust for both portrait and landscape orientations. Pricing & availability While the exact pricing details have not yet been announced, espresso Displays has confirmed that the Espresso 15 Pro will be available for purchase in the coming months. Based on their existing product lineup, it’s expected to be positioned as a premium offering, likely falling between their entry-level and 17 Pro models. Final thoughts Espresso Displays continues to push the boundaries of portable monitor technology, and the Espresso 15 Pro looks to be another hit. It offers significant upgrades in brightness, color accuracy, and portability, making it an excellent choice for professionals who need a reliable second screen on the go. As someone who has used their products extensively, I’m excited to see how the Espresso 15 Pro performs in real-world scenarios. Whether you’re a creative professional, a frequent traveler, or someone looking to boost productivity, this portable monitor is worth keeping an eye on. html:
Espresso Displays, the Australian brand known for crafting high-performance portable monitors, has unveiled its latest innovation at CES 2025: the Espresso 15 Pro. This new addition to Espresso Displays’ portfolio is aimed at business professionals and frequent travelers who seek a high-quality, portable dual-screen experience.

Having used and reviewed multiple products from Espresso Displays over the years, including the premium 17 Pro and the budget-friendly 15-inch display, I can attest to the brand’s consistent focus on quality, innovation, and user-centric design. Their monitors have always been excellent tools for productivity on the go, and the new Espresso 15 Pro seems to build on that reputation with some exciting upgrades.

Key features of the Espresso 15 Pro

The Espresso 15 Pro offers a brighter, more compact, and more efficient portable display solution, with specs that cater to both business users and creatives alike:

  • Brightness: 550 nits for excellent visibility even in bright environments
  • Resolution: 4K UHD (3840 x 2160) for crystal-clear visuals
  • Color Range: More than one billion colors with 100% AdobeRGB coverage
  • Touchscreen Compatibility: Works with macOS, Windows, iPhones, iPads, and Samsung Galaxy devices via DeX
  • Pen Support: Compatible with the espresso Pen for note-taking, sketching, and markups
  • Portability: Single USB-C cable connection and lightweight aluminum build for easy transport

The device connects seamlessly to laptops, tablets, and even smartphones, making it an ideal companion for those who need flexibility in their work setups. The magnetic Stand+ accessory further enhances usability by providing ergonomic viewing angles and quick setup.

Design & build quality

Espresso Displays are known for their minimalist and premium designs, and the Espresso 15 Pro is no exception. With a sleek matte-black aluminum chassis, the monitor exudes professionalism while ensuring durability. The magnetic attachment to the Stand+ makes it easy to set up and adjust for both portrait and landscape orientations.

Pricing & availability

While the exact pricing details have not yet been announced, espresso Displays has confirmed that the Espresso 15 Pro will be available for purchase in the coming months. Based on their existing product lineup, it’s expected to be positioned as a premium offering, likely falling between their entry-level and 17 Pro models.

Final thoughts

Espresso Displays continues to push the boundaries of portable monitor technology, and the Espresso 15 Pro looks to be another hit. It offers significant upgrades in brightness, color accuracy, and portability, making it an excellent choice for professionals who need a reliable second screen on the go.

As someone who has used their products extensively, I’m excited to see how the Espresso 15 Pro performs in real-world scenarios. Whether you’re a creative professional, a frequent traveler, or someone looking to boost productivity, this portable monitor is worth keeping an eye on.
